title: Black soldiers in the World War Two, and medical history research
itunes:title: Black soldiers in the World War Two, and medical history research
itunes:subtitle: Stephen Bourne reflects on the black contribution to Britain's fight against the Axis, while Alun Withey introduces a new medical history project.
description:
Stephen Bourne reflects on the black contribution to Britain's fight against the Axis, while Alun Withey introduces a new medical history project.
